name: Kruger
description: I’m a man of good sense of humor I’m just kind of old fashion, and I just feel like this might be a fair option to try… and see how things turns out.. am looking for the woman that will be able to make my sing once more. She has to be honest, trustworthy, loving, faithful and do not lie to me or cheat on me. I will send mail and chat to make the date first
